casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Charles Everette HINTON. No. 449P11-13. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Feb. 19, 2016. Charles E. Hinton, Nashville, for Hinton, Charles Everette. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of February 2016 by Petitioner for Inquiry into Restraints on Liberty; Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus; Relief from Judgments and Orders:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of February 2016."
